messages.subject: Re: unschoolers in my area
messages.msgSnippet: ... Check out nhen.org for homeschool support groups in your state, many times there are unschoolers who belong to these, not just traditional curriculum etc
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "home_wkids" <LCB@o...> wrote:
>
> Hi, I just recently started unschooling, relaxing a little with my
> children 8dd and 4 ds. I know this is off topic, but is there any
> unschoolers in Oregon in the Tillamook County area? My kids need some
> buddies and so do I.
> Crystle
>

Check out nhen.org for homeschool support groups in your state, many
times there are unschoolers who belong to these, not just "traditional"
curriculum etc homeschoolers. It's another place to check! Hope you
get some responses here.

Also try seaching under the yahoo groups for unschooling plus your
state, maybe there's a group (I found one for mine that way).
Sometimes you have to search through the results, depending on how you
word it too.
Jann (in MA)

Hi, I just recently started unschooling, relaxing a little with my
children 8dd and 4 ds. I know this is off topic, but is there any
unschoolers in Oregon in the Tillamook County area? My kids need some
buddies and so do I.
Crystle
